ingredients.ingredient: 1 large stalk celery, cut into 3 pieces

cookingTips: Cut celery pieces to a child-friendly size and remove strings for easier snacking
Mix cinnamon into the peanut butter for more even distribution of flavor
Arrange raisins on top of peanut butter to create the 'ant' appearance
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help parents and educators create an interactive, nutritious snack that teaches children about food assembly and portion control.
